paragraphs.title: Import Functions
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, max, min, isnull
from pyspark.sql.functions import count, sum, avg, row_number
from pyspark.sql.functions import desc
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, round
from datetime import datetime, timedelta as td
from pyspark.sql.functions import datediff,to_date,to_timestamp
from pyspark.sql.functions import countDistinct
from pyspark.sql.functions import lit
from pyspark.sql.functions import substring
from pyspark.sql.functions import broadcast
spark.version

paragraphs.title: Date Definition
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

today = (datetime.today() - td(days=0))

d0 = (today - td(days=1)).date()     # Yesterday
d1 = (today - td(days=2)).date()     # Day Before Yesterday
d6 = (today - td(days=6)).date()     # 6 Days back
d7 = (today - td(days=8)).date()     # -1 week
d14 = (today - td(days=15)).date()   # -2 week
d21 = (today - td(days=22)).date()   # -3 week
d28 = (today - td(days=29)).date()   # -4 week
d35 = (today - td(days=36)).date()   # -5 week
d42 = (today - td(days=43)).date()   # -6 week
d49 = (today - td(days=50)).date()   # -7 week
d56 = (today - td(days=57)).date()   # -8 week

d180 = (today - td(days=180)).date() # -6 Month

print d0.strftime('%A'),d1.strftime('%A'),d6.strftime('%A'),d7.strftime('%A'),d14.strftime('%A'),d21.strftime('%A'),d28.strftime('%A'),d35.strftime('%A'),d42.strftime('%A'),d49.strftime('%A'),d56.strftime('%A')

print d0,d1,d6,d7,d14,d21,d28,d35,d42,d180

result.msg:
Saturday Friday Monday Saturday Saturday Saturday Saturday Saturday Saturday Saturday Saturday
2018-05-19 2018-05-18 2018-05-14 2018-05-12 2018-05-05 2018-04-28 2018-04-21 2018-04-14 2018-04-07 2017-11-21

paragraphs.title: Sales Calculations
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

################### Source Data ######################


lot_stk_move = spark.sql("select * from dub_galkhail.zed_lot_stk_move")\
                    .fillna({'tsm_qty_pack':'0','tsm_qty_loose':'0','tsm_conv_lsstk':'1'})\
                    .withColumn("tsm_qty_total",col("tsm_qty_pack")+col("tsm_qty_loose")/col("tsm_conv_lsstk"))\
                    .withColumn("tsm_cre_date",to_date("tsm_cre_dt")).withColumn("tsm_doc_date",to_date("tsm_doc_date"))\
                    .filter(col("tsm_cre_date")>=d180)\
                    .filter(col("tsm_cre_date")<today.date())

lot_trn_head = spark.sql("select * from dub_galkhail.zed_lot_trn_head")\
                    .withColumn("trxh_cre_date",to_date("trxh_cre_dt")).withColumn("trxh_doc_date",to_date("trxh_doc_date"))\
                    .filter(col("trxh_cre_date")>=d56)

broadcast(lot_trn_head)

lot_stk_move1 = lot_stk_move.join(lot_trn_head,col("tsm_doc_no")==col("trxh_doc_no"),"inner")
lot_stk_move1.cache()

Products = spark.sql("select prod_code as tsm_prod_code,prod_desc as Prod_Description,prod_div_code,prod_prsgrp_code from dub_ho.zed_lom_mst_product")

Master = spark.sql("select camd_entity_code as prod_div_code,camd_entity_desc as Prod_Division from dub_ho.zed_lom_mst_carry_all_detl where camd_entity_group='DIVISION'")

################## Data Check #############################
if(lot_stk_move1.filter(col("tsm_cre_dt")>=to_timestamp(lit((str(d0)+" 21:00:00")), "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")).count()==0):
    print("No data present for yesterday")
    exit()
else:
    print("Data present for yesterday")
################## Product Classification #################

Product_Class = lot_stk_move.groupBy("tsm_prod_code")\
                            .agg(min("tsm_doc_date").alias("Min_Date"),sum("tsm_lc_value").alias("Total_Sales"),\
                                  countDistinct("tsm_doc_date").alias("Days_Sold"),round(avg("tsm_lc_price"),2).alias("Avg_Selling_Price"))\
                            .withColumn("Total_Days",datediff(lit(d0),col("Min_Date"))+1)\
                            .withColumn("Days_Sold_Ratio",col("Days_Sold")/col("Total_Days"))\
                            .withColumn("Cum_Sales",sum("Total_Sales").over(Window.partitionBy().orderBy(desc("Total_Sales"))))\
                            .withColumn("Store_Sales",sum("Total_Sales").over(Window.partitionBy()))\
                            .withColumn("Perc",col("Cum_Sales")/col("Store_Sales"))\
                            .withColumn("A_B_C",when(col("Perc")<=0.80,"A").otherwise(when(col("Perc")<=0.95,"B").otherwise("C")))\
                            .withColumn("F_M_S",when(col("Days_Sold_Ratio")>=0.75,"F").otherwise(when(col("Days_Sold_Ratio")>=0.25,"M").otherwise("S")))\
                            .select("tsm_prod_code","Avg_Selling_Price","A_B_C","F_M_S")

################## Sales Calculation #################

D1_Sales = lot_stk_move1.filter(col("tsm_doc_date")==d0).groupBy("tsm_prod_code").agg(round(sum("tsm_qty_total"),0).alias("D0_Sales"))
D2_Sales = lot_stk_move1.filter(col("tsm_doc_date")==d1).groupBy("tsm_prod_code").agg(round(sum("tsm_qty_total"),0).alias("D1_Sales"))
D8_Sales = lot_stk_move1.filter(col("tsm_doc_date")==d7).groupBy("tsm_prod_code").agg(round(sum("tsm_qty_total"),0).alias("D7_Sales"))
Avg_Sales = lot_stk_move1.filter(col("tsm_doc_date").isin([d14,d21,d28,d35,d42]))\
                         .groupBy("tsm_prod_code","tsm_doc_date").agg(round(sum("tsm_qty_total"),0).alias("Tot_Sales"))\
                         .withColumn("Rank",row_number().over(Window.partitionBy("tsm_prod_code").orderBy(desc("Tot_Sales"))))\
                         .filter("Rank==3").withColumnRenamed("Tot_Sales","Avg_Sales")

broadcast(D1_Sales)
broadcast(D2_Sales)
broadcast(D8_Sales)
broadcast(Product_Class)
broadcast(Products)
broadcast(Master)


Sales_Alkhail = Product_Class.join(D8_Sales,"tsm_prod_code","leftouter")\
                             .join(D2_Sales,"tsm_prod_code","leftouter")\
                             .join(D1_Sales,"tsm_prod_code","leftouter")\
                             .join(Avg_Sales,"tsm_prod_code","leftouter")\
                             .join(Products,"tsm_prod_code","leftouter")\
                             .join(Master,"prod_div_code","leftouter").fillna(0)\
                             .withColumn("Rule_1",when(col("D0_Sales") < 0.15*col("Avg_Sales"), 1).otherwise(0))\
                             .withColumn("Rule_2",when(col("D0_Sales") < 0.15*col("D7_Sales"), 1).otherwise(0))\
                             .withColumn("Rule_3",when(col("D0_Sales") < 0.15*col("D1_Sales"), 1).otherwise(0))\
                             .withColumn("Rules_Broken",col("Rule_1")+col("Rule_2")+col("Rule_3"))\
                             .withColumn("Sales_Alert",when(col("Rules_Broken")>=2,1).otherwise(0))\
                             .withColumn("Create_Date",lit(d0))\
                             .withColumnRenamed("tsm_prod_code","Prod_Code")

#Sales.printSchema()
#Sales.orderBy(desc("Avg_Sales")).show(50,False)
Sales_Alkhail.cache()
print Sales_Alkhail.count()

paragraphs.title: Alert Items
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

Alert = Sales_Alkhail.filter("(A_B_C='A' and F_M_S in ('F','M')) or (A_B_C='B' and F_M_S='F')")\
                     .filter("Avg_Sales>5 and D7_Sales>5").filter("Sales_Alert==1")\
                     .filter("Prod_Division!='TEXTILES' or (Prod_Division='TEXTILES' and Avg_Selling_Price>20)")\
                     .filter("Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%OFFER%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%@%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%OFF PRICE%' AND Prod_Description NOT                               LIKE '%+%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%SPECIAL PRICE%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%@SP %' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%PROMO%'                                  AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%DISCOUNT%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%\% OFF%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%\% OFF%'                                               AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%\% EXTRA%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%\%EXTRA%'")\
                     .orderBy("Prod_Division",desc("Avg_Sales"))
 
df = Alert.select("Prod_Code","Prod_Description","Prod_Division","D0_Sales","D1_Sales","D7_Sales","Avg_Sales")
print "Alerted Products :",df.count()
df.show(100,False)

paragraphs.title: Email UDF
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

import csv
from tabulate import tabulate
from email.mime.multipart import MIMEMultipart
from email.mime.text import MIMEText
from email.mime.application import MIMEApplication
import smtplib

def email_alert_udf(me,password,you,cc,subject,text,html,df,d0):
	list =df.rdd.map(lambda row: [str(c) for c in row]).collect()
	data = [df.columns]+list
	text = text.format(table=tabulate(data, headers="firstrow", tablefmt="grid"))
	html = html.format(table=tabulate(data, headers="firstrow", tablefmt="html"))

	message = MIMEMultipart("alternative", None, [MIMEText(text),MIMEText(html,'html')])

	message['Subject'] = subject
	message['From'] = me
	message['To'] = ", ".join(you)
	message['Cc'] = ", ".join(cc)
	
	with open('/tmp/some-file.csv', 'wt') as fw:
	    writer = csv.writer(fw)
	    writer.writerows(data)
	
	part = MIMEApplication(open('/tmp/some-file.csv', 'r').read())
	part['Content-Disposition'] = 'attachment; filename=%s' % "Products List : "+str(d0.strftime('%d-%m-%Y'))+".csv"
	message.attach(part)
	
	server = 'smtp.office365.com:587'
	server = smtplib.SMTP(server)
	server.ehlo()
	server.starttls()
	server.login(me, password)
	server.sendmail(me, you+cc, message.as_string())
	server.quit()
	print("Email Sent Successfully")

paragraphs.title: Sales Alarm Email
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark me = 'info@zedeyelabs.com' password = 'Zedeye@123' you = ['dhanish@grandhyper.com'] cc = ['ameen@grandhyper.com','sajad@grandhyper.com','mahamoodtp@grandhyper.com','vishal@grandhyper.com','abbas@grandhyper.com','nizarpk@grandhyper.com','rinaz.belhaj@zedeyelabs.com','rahul.malani@zedeyelabs.com','sarvesh.rao@zedeyelabs.com'] subject = "Sales Alarm for Non Performing SKUs - GAlkhail" text = """ Hello Store Managers, Please find the below list of fast moving and high value SKUs whose sales performance is not as per the expectation on """+str(d0.strftime('%A : %d-%b-%Y'))+""". Kindly have a look at it and respond with reasons behind poor performance. Note: D0_Sales - Yesterday's ["""+d0.strftime('%A')+"""] Sales Quantity D1_Sales - Day Before Yesterday's ["""+d1.strftime('%A')+"""] Sales Quantity D7_Sales - Last Week """+d7.strftime('%A')+"""'s Sales Quantity Avg_Sales - Average Sales Quantity of Last 6 """+d7.strftime('%A')+"""s {table} Regards, Zedeye Labs """ html = """

Hello Store Managers,

Please find the below list of fast moving and high value SKUs whose sales performance on """+str(d0.strftime('%A : %d-%b-%Y'))+""" was not as per the expectation. Kindly have a look at it and respond with reasons behind poor performance.

Note:

D0_Sales - Yesterday's ["""+d0.strftime('%A')+"""] Sales Quantity
D1_Sales - Day Before Yesterday's ["""+d1.strftime('%A')+"""] Sales Quantity
D7_Sales - Last Week """+d7.strftime('%A')+"""'s Sales Quantity
Avg_Sales - Average Sales Quantity of Last 6 """+d7.strftime('%A')+"""s


{table}

Regards,
Zedeye Labs

""" if(df.count()>0): email_alert_udf(me,password,you,cc,subject,text,html,df,d0) out_path = "s3://zedeyelabs/Projects/Sales_Alarm/Dubai/GAlkhail/"+ str(d0)[0:4] +"/" + str(d0)[5:7]+"/"+str(d0)[8:10]+"/" Alert.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(out_path) print("Files Written to S3") else: print("No Mail Sent") print(you) print(cc) Sales_Alkhail.unpersist() lot_stk_move1.unpersist() print("")

paragraphs.title: Escalation Mail to Higher Management
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark you = ['ameen@grandhyper.com'] cc = ['dhanish@grandhyper.com','sajad@grandhyper.com','mahamoodtp@grandhyper.com','vishal@grandhyper.com','abbas@grandhyper.com','nizarpk@grandhyper.com','rinaz.belhaj@zedeyelabs.com','rahul.malani@zedeyelabs.com'] subject = "Escalation : Sales Alarm for Non Performing SKUs - GAlkhail" text = """ Dear Anvar Sir, Please find the below list of fast moving and high value SKUs whose sales performance was poor for last 6 days. Kindly discuss the same with the concerned store manager. Note: 6Day_Avg_Sales - Last 6 Days Average Sales Quantity Avg_Sales - Last 28 Days Average Sales Quantity {table} Regards, Zedeye Labs """ html = """

Dear Anvar Sir,

Please find the below list of fast moving and high value SKUs whose sales performance was poor for last 6 days. Kindly discuss the same with the concerned store manager.

Note:

6Day_Avg_Sales - Last 6 Days Average Sales Quantity
Avg_Sales - Last 28 Days Average Sales Quantity


{table}

Regards,
Zedeye Labs

""" in_path = "s3://zedeyelabs/Projects/Sales_Alarm/Dubai/GAlkhail/*/*/*/" Alarm_3 = spark.read.parquet(in_path).filter(col("Create_Date")>=d6)\ .groupBy("Prod_Code","Prod_Description","Prod_Division")\ .agg(sum("Sales_Alert").alias("Alarm"),round(avg("D0_Sales"),0).alias("6Day_Avg_Sales"),round(avg("Avg_Sales"),0).alias("Avg_Sales"))\ .filter("Alarm>=6").drop("Alarm")\ .orderBy("Prod_Division",desc("Avg_Sales")) Alarm_3.show(5) if(Alarm_3.count()>0): print("Escalated today") email_alert_udf(me,password,you,cc,subject,text,html,Alarm_3,d0) else: print("No Escalation today")
